#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdlib>
using namespace std;
int a[100000];
int n,q,x;

int main(){
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for (int i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
    }
    sort(a,a+n);
    scanf("%d",&q);
    while(q--){
        scanf("%d",&x);
        int left = 0;
        int right = n-1;
        for (int i = 30; i >= 0 && left < right; i--) {
            if( ((a[left]>>i)&1) == ((a[right]>>i)&1) )continue;
            int l = left;
            int r = right;
            while (r - l > 1) {
                int m = (r+l)/2;
                if ((a[m]>>i)&1) r = m;
                else l = m;
            }
            if ((x>>i)&1) right = l;
            else left = r;
        }
        printf("%d\n", x ^ a[left]);
    }
}
